intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: We take your privacy seriously. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.text: We collect the following types of information:
dataCollection.item3: Usage data to improve our service

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.text: Your data is used to provide and improve our language learning service, track your progress, and personalize your learning experience.

security.title: Data Security
security.text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
security.item1: Passwords are securely hashed using bcrypt algorithm and never stored in plain text
security.item2: OpenAI API keys are encrypted using AES-256-GCM encryption before storage
security.item3: Authentication uses secure JWT tokens with short expiration times and refresh token rotation
security.item4: All data transmission is encrypted via HTTPS/TLS

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and remember your preferences. We do not use tracking cookies for advertising purposes.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.text: We may use third-party services like OpenAI for AI-powered features. When you use these features, your data may be processed by these services according to their privacy policies.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can delete your account at any time from your profile settings.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us:
